alert.note: Alert for Owyhee Mountains; Southern Highlands (Idaho) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Boise (Southwestern Idaho and Eastern Oregon)
info.headline: Red Flag Warning issued August 26 at 1:40PM MDT until August 27 at 9:00PM MDT by NWS Boise
info.description: ...GUSTY WINDS AND LOW HUMIDITIES ACROSS IDAHO ZONES 423 AND 426 ON SATURDAY... .A closed low will push a dry cold front through the area with gusty winds on Saturday. Breezy southwesterly winds ahead of the front Saturday morning will shift to the west to northwest behind the front Saturday afternoon and become gusty. This combined with low afternoon humidities will result in critical fire weather conditions. Winds will decrease with increasing humidities by mid evening. ...RED FLAG WARNING IN EFFECT FROM NOON TO 9 PM MDT SATURDAY FOR GUSTY WINDS AND LOW RELATIVE HUMIDITIES FOR OWYHEE MOUNTAINS AND SOUTHERN HIGHLANDS...WHICH ARE FIRE WEATHER ZONES 423 AND 426... The National Weather Service in Boise has issued a Red Flag Warning, which is in effect from noon to 9 PM MDT Saturday. The Fire Weather Watch is no longer in effect. * WINDS...15-25 MPH with gusts up to 35 MPH. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...Around 10 percent.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are either occurring now, or will occur shortly.
